Package com.CMPUT301F22T26.foodegy

Class DatabaseManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.CMPUT301F22T26.foodegy.DatabaseManager
  • public class DatabaseManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Singleton class to handle interacting with the database, adding/editing/deleting ingredients/recipes/meal plans
